componentDescription: Drop in replacement of the Radio, Switch and Checkbox component. Use this component if you want to display an extra label.

propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.control: A control element. For instance, it can be a Radio, a Switch or a Checkbox.
propDescriptions.inputRef: Pass a ref to the input element.
propDescriptions.label: The text to be used in an enclosing label element.
propDescriptions.onChange:
Callback fired when the state is changed.

Signature:
function(event: object) => void
event: The event source of the callback. You can pull out the new checked state by accessing event.target.checked (boolean).

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

labelPlacementStart.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

labelPlacementTop.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

labelPlacementBottom.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

disabled.description: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

label.description: Styles applied to the label's Typography component.
